Provide the information about the drivin: Provide the information about the driving license you wish to obtain.
Review all your information and make any: Review all your information and make any necessary changes.
Pay, download your invoice, and contact: Pay, download your invoice, and contact your driving school for further instructions.
You will need to choose the type of lice: You will need to choose the type of license, your examination center, and the driving school that will present you for the exam, and make the payment for the registration fees associated with this license. Please note that certain licenses are subject to specific conditions. If you wish to obtain a 'C' license, for example, your 'B' license must be at least 1 year old.
You will need to choose your examination: You will need to choose your examination center and the driving school that will present you.
Choose a new center or driving school if: Choose a new center or driving school if you wish to discontinue your journey with your current driving school.
After being absent from the theory or pr: After being absent from the theory or practical driving test
If your excuse for absence is accepted,: If your excuse for absence is accepted, you can request a new examination without having to pay the registration fee. If your excuse for absence is not accepted, you will need to register again so that your driving school can present you for another session of the driving license exam. If you have not yet provided a justification for your absence, you can either submit a valid excuse or register again if you do not have any supporting documents.
Process (When you have not yet justified: Process (When you have not yet justified your absence)
Explain the reason for your absence and: Explain the reason for your absence and provide supporting documentation.
I passed the written exam and failed the: I passed the written exam and failed the driving test.
I was absent for the driving test: I was absent for the driving test.
I was absent for the coding exam: I was absent for the coding exam
Before starting the process, please have: Before starting the process, please have the following items ready
A scanned copy of your ID card, biometri: A scanned copy of your ID card, biometric identity card, or passport.
A scanned copy of your medical examinati: A scanned copy of your medical examination record.
A scanned copy of your blood typing test: A scanned copy of your blood typing test.
The names and contacts of the doctors wh: The names and contacts of the doctors who conducted your medical examination and blood grouping test.
The sum of XX,000 CFA Francs to a MoMo o: The sum of XX,000 CFA Francs to a MoMo or Moov Money account or for payment of examination registration fees.
If the attachments in your folder are bl: If the attachments in your folder are blurry, it will be rejected.
The name and contact information of the: The name and contact information of the doctor who conducted your medical examination.
The amount of XX,000 FCFA on a MoMo or M: The amount of XX,000 FCFA on a MoMo or Moov Money account or for payment of registration fees for the exam.
Your absence from the driving test, Apri: Your absence from the driving test, April 2022 session, was not justified. Therefore, you are once again required to pay the administrative fees.
I would like to justify my absence: I would like to justify my absence
